   Pretty print a `node` of type `DefElem <https://github.com/pganalyze/libpg_query/blob/fce106a/src/postgres/include/nodes/parsenodes.h#L805>`__, when it is inside a `TransactionStmt <https://github.com/pganalyze/libpg_query/blob/fce106a/src/postgres/include/nodes/parsenodes.h#L3497>`__, to the `output` stream.
